mapper.select: select id, userID, sexId, date, idCard, workplace, telephone, contactName, contactPhone, typeOfPermanent, ethnicGroupID, bloodTypeID, educationId, marriageId, pamentMethId, name, workId from healthRecord where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into healthRecord(userID, sexId, date, idCard, workplace, telephone, contactName, contactPhone, typeOfPermanent, ethnicGroupID, bloodTypeID, educationId, marriageId, pamentMethId, name, workId) values (#{userid}, #{sexid}, #{date}, #{idcard}, #{workplace}, #{telephone}, #{contactname}, #{contactphone}, #{typeofpermanent}, #{ethnicgroupid}, #{bloodtypeid}, #{educationid}, #{marriageid}, #{pamentmethid}, #{name}, #{workid})

insert into healthRecord(userID, sexId, date, idCard, workplace, telephone, contactName, contactPhone, typeOfPermanent, ethnicGroupID, bloodTypeID, educationId, marriageId, pamentMethId, name, workId) values
(#{entity.userid}, #{entity.sexid}, #{entity.date}, #{entity.idcard}, #{entity.workplace}, #{entity.telephone}, #{entity.contactname}, #{entity.contactphone}, #{entity.typeofpermanent}, #{entity.ethnicgroupid}, #{entity.bloodtypeid}, #{entity.educationid}, #{entity.marriageid}, #{entity.pamentmethid}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.workid})

insert into healthRecord(userID, sexId, date, idCard, workplace, telephone, contactName, contactPhone, typeOfPermanent, ethnicGroupID, bloodTypeID, educationId, marriageId, pamentMethId, name, workId) values
(#{entity.userid}, #{entity.sexid}, #{entity.date}, #{entity.idcard}, #{entity.workplace}, #{entity.telephone}, #{entity.contactname}, #{entity.contactphone}, #{entity.typeofpermanent}, #{entity.ethnicgroupid}, #{entity.bloodtypeid}, #{entity.educationid}, #{entity.marriageid}, #{entity.pamentmethid}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.workid})
on duplicate key update userID = values(userID), sexId = values(sexId), date = values(date), idCard = values(idCard), workplace = values(workplace), telephone = values(telephone), contactName = values(contactName), contactPhone = values(contactPhone), typeOfPermanent = values(typeOfPermanent), ethnicGroupID = values(ethnicGroupID), bloodTypeID = values(bloodTypeID), educationId = values(educationId), marriageId = values(marriageId), pamentMethId = values(pamentMethId), name = values(name), workId = values(workId)
mapper.update:
update healthRecord
userID = #{userid},
sexId = #{sexid},
date = #{date},
idCard = #{idcard},
workplace = #{workplace},
telephone = #{telephone},
contactName = #{contactname},
contactPhone = #{contactphone},
typeOfPermanent = #{typeofpermanent},
ethnicGroupID = #{ethnicgroupid},
bloodTypeID = #{bloodtypeid},
educationId = #{educationid},
marriageId = #{marriageid},
pamentMethId = #{pamentmethid},
name = #{name},
workId = #{workid},
where id = #{id}
